page.title: 05Commerce
page.content: Rochdale has a modern shopping precinct. It was opened on the 15th September 1978, and contains a wide variety of shops; the conventional chainstores with some local businesses.The town also has an indoor and outdoor market. The town has a wide selection of hypermarkets such as Asda and Tesco for foodstuffs; MFI and B&Q for furnishing; as well as Comet for electrical appliances. Plans are presently underway for the further extension of the shopping precinct, which is indicative of the town's healthy commercial trade.
